definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
weaponry/to hold (a weapon)/to wield/to rely on/to depend on/war/battle

sentences.english: A snow fight helps pass the time.
sentences.chinese: 他們靠打雪仗打發時間。

sentences.english: Snowball fights in the north children often play a game .
sentences.chinese: 打雪仗是北方孩子們經常玩得一種遊戲。

sentences.english: But we can definitely have a snow fight .
sentences.chinese: 反正打場雪仗是絕對不成問題。

sentences.english: Ben and Kiki start a snow ball fight.
sentences.chinese: 琪琪和小本打起了雪仗。

sentences.english: They get small Sis at Lan wave building front vacant land up fight snow battle.
sentences.chinese: 他們領着小廝們在瀾波館前面空地上打雪仗。

sentences.english: Sometimes we make snowballs and throw them!
sentences.chinese: 有時我們做雪球，打雪仗。

sentences.english: Winter in many places means ice skating, sledding and snowball fights.
sentences.chinese: 在許多地方冬天意味着滑冰，使用雪橇和打雪仗。

sentences.english: Winter in many places means ice skating, sledding and snowball fights .
sentences.chinese: 在許多地方冬天意味着溜冰，雪橇和打雪仗。

sentences.english: And we can fight with snowballs. Which season do you like best?
sentences.chinese: 而且我們可以打用雪球打雪仗。你最喜歡哪個季節？

definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
